    • lineFromY

      public int lineFromY(float y)
      Transforms a real y-coordinate into the index of the corresponding line.
      Parameters:
      y - a float y-coordinate
      Returns:
      the index of the corresponding line.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the float coordinate doesn't fit in the game board.

    • drawOnlyOneCell

      public static void drawOnlyOneCell(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, SimpleGameData data, SimpleGameView view, float x, float y)
      Draws only the cell specified by the given coordinates in the game board from its data, using an existing ApplicationContext.
      Parameters:
      context - the ApplicationContext of the game
      data - the GameData containing the game data.
      view - the GameView on which to draw.
      x - the float x-coordinate of the cell.
      y - the float y-coordinate of the cell.
